segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes by the sink, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, creating a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is already in the water, but she doesn't seem to feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that plate, it's like she's in another world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's going to slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are up to no good, but she doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she is with all this chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause so much damage if it keeps overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really tell her what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a recipe for disaster, and she's just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR
